title: Can I use my gaming PC for music production? Or do I need to change the hardware component? Can anyone suggest me what hardware will be best for both music production and gaming? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you are gonna just start recording with basic stuff like headphone mic and audacity then it's fine. If you are gonna buy mixers and sound cards then make sure your computer has a good smps(switched mode power supply). Since you say that you are having a gaming pc then you must be having a good one. ;) Cheers

This seems like too generic a question. Details such as your computer specifications, what external devices you will be hooking up with the computer for music production and what applications you will be using for the same are required to make any sensible suggestions online.
